name: Chammy
description:
STORY

Fruits are falling from the sky and connecting everything together! Try to stay alive as long as you can CHAMMY! Don’t forget to use your enormous TONGUE!

OBJECTIVE

Stay alive for the longest time!!

CONTROLS

[HOLD RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON] to stick your tongue

[AWSD] to move 

[R] to Restart

TEAM

[Code / Game Design / Art*]

Ernani Rocha 

Music 

PsySurf

Special thanks for the helping hand Lucas Pingu, Will Fernandes, and Bashar Saade. 

Fruits by Layerlab
